member.name: T:BlazorApp.Mac.AppDelegate
member.summary: The NSApplicationDelegate for the application. This class is responsible for launching the User Interface of the application, as well as listening (and optionally responding) to application events from macOS.

member.name: M:BlazorApp.Mac.AppDelegate.DidFinishLaunching(Foundation.NSNotification)
member.summary: Override point for customization after application launch. If not required for your application you can safely delete this method.

member.name: M:BlazorApp.Mac.AppDelegate.WillTerminate(Foundation.NSNotification)
member.summary: Called when the application will terminate.. Use this method to release any resources that were specific to the application.

member.name: T:BlazorApp.Mac.ViewController
member.summary: A view controller for the main view.

member.name: M:BlazorApp.Mac.ViewController.#ctor(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The handle to the native object.

member.name: P:BlazorApp.Mac.ViewController.RepresentedObject
member.summary: Gets or sets the represented object.

member.name: M:BlazorApp.Mac.ViewController.ViewDidLoad
member.summary: Called after the view is loaded into memory.
